root: ^Say Mzukulu. What did you learn at school today?
^uhhhhm, I learnt a lot about great civilizations. The Romans, Ancient Greece and Britian
^Ok and what about where we live, any civilizations from Africa?
^I learnt about Egypt and…actually that was it. We are the worlds second largest continent though.
^There are many great empires from Africa some of them you may never get to hear about.
